'''2.3.562''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on January 9, 2023.</onlyinclude>

== Changes ==
* Error messaging updates to help readability and improve localization.
* Under the hood data flow updates.
* Various UI fixes & improvements.

== Fixes ==
* New skin bug fix.
